arts.ttl: Lee Grant expresses his delight as Huddersfield earn shoot-out win at Sunderland
arts.sum: The game reached spot-kicks after Marc Guiu cancelled out Leo Castledine’s opener to draw 1-1 in normal time.

arts.ttl: Huddersfield dump Sunderland out of Carabao Cup on pens
arts.sum: Huddersfield reached the third round of the Carabao Cup with a 6-5 penalty shoot-out win against Sunderland at the Stadium of Light.

arts.ttl: Huddersfield win shoot-out to sink Sunderland and reach Carabao Cup third round
arts.sum: The teams were level after 90 minutes.

arts.ttl: Andy’s Player Ratings: Sunderland 1 (5) -1 (6) Huddersfield – Guiu off the mark but the Lads lose out on penalties
arts.sum: Anthony Patterson: 6/10 Didn’t have a genuine save to make during the game, as he had no chance with the Huddersfield goal, did spill a dangerous pass into the six-yard box that Neil had to bail him out for. Didn’t make a save during the shoot-out, despite getting close to a few of them. Niall […]

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Huddersfield – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland begin their Carabao Cup campaign with a second-round clash against Huddersfield Town. Regis Le Bris’ side welcome The Terriers to the Stadium Light, seeking to bounce back from defeat at Burnley in the Premier League over the weekend. The Black Cats are set to make several changes to that side, as Le Bris looks […] The post Sunderland vs Huddersfield – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Score Predictions: Sunderland vs Huddersfield Town [H]
arts.sum: Martin Wanless predicts… Score prediction: Sunderland 2 Huddersfield Town 1 Sunderland’s first goalscorer: Wilson Isidor After Saturday’s defeat, a number of the Lads will be looking to stake a claim for a place in Saturday’s team tonight, so I’m hoping we see a strong display. Wilson Isidor, Marc Guiu, Enzo Le Fée, and our new […]

arts.ttl: Starting XI: All change for Sunderland against Huddersfield tonight?
arts.sum: There’s been a lot of transfer activity over the summer with players coming in, but there haven’t been that many who’ve moved out yet, so tonight’s game against Huddersfield offers them the opportunity to either stake their claim for a place in the starting XI come Saturday, or a move away from the club, either […]

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Huddersfield Town: Carabao Cup Preview, Round 2, 2025
arts.sum: Sunderland host League One side Huddersfield Town in the second round of the Carabao Cup on Tuesday night. Chris Rigg, Dan Neil, Anthony Patterson and Wilson Isidor, who were all mainstays in Sunderland's play-off winning campaign last season, are all expected to play a part on Tuesday night.
